```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caTools)
library(rpart)
library(rattle)
library(rpart.plot)
library(ElemStatLearn)
```

```{r}
dataset <- read.csv("Social_Network_Ads.csv") %>% 
  select(Age:Purchased) %>% 
  mutate(Purchased = factor(Purchased, levels = c(0, 1)))
```

```{r}
split <- sample.split(dataset %>% 
                        pull(Purchased),
                      SplitRatio = .75)
training_set <- dataset %>% 
  subset(split == T) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.integer, scale)
test_set <- dataset %>% 
  subset(split == F) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.integer, scale)
```

```{r}
classifier <- rpart(formula = Purchased ~ .,
                    data = training_set)
```

```{r}
y_pred <- predict(classifier, 
                  newdata = test_set %>% 
                    select(-Purchased),
                  type = "class")
```
```{r}
cm <- table(test_set %>% 
              pull(Purchased),
            y_pred)
cm
```

```{r}
prp(classifier, varlen = 0)
```

```{r}
set <- training_set
X1 <- seq(min(set[, 1]) - 1, max(set[, 1]) + 1, by = .01)
X2 <- seq(min(set[, 2]) - 1, max(set[, 2]) + 1, by = .01)
grid_set <- expand.grid(X1, X2)
colnames(grid_set) <- c("Age", "EstimatedSalary")

y_grid <- predict(classifier, newdata = grid_set)
```

```{r}
glimpse(grid_set)
```
